aiSecurity.heroSubtitle: Shield large language models, prompts, and training pipelines from adversarial manipulation and data leakage.
aiSecurity.heroSupporting: We combine offensive simulations with automated guardrails so your generative AI remains trusted and compliant.
aiSecurity.overviewTitle: Secure every stage of the model lifecycle
overviewParagraphs: From data sourcing to in-production inference, The SamurAI hardens each point where attackers can poison prompts, exfiltrate data, or jailbreak controls.
Our red and blue teams operate as one fusion unit, delivering prioritized mitigations so you can innovate responsibly.

highlights.title: AI-native expertise
highlights.description: Specialists in LLM red teaming, adversarial prompting, and safety evaluations.

highlights.title: Guardrail automation
highlights.description: Deploy policy-as-code to quarantine risky outputs before they reach users.

highlights.title: Compliance ready
highlights.description: Map every recommendation to evolving regulations and internal governance.

useCases.title: Customer copilots
useCases.description: Prevent prompt injection and sensitive data disclosure in chat experiences.

useCases.title: Document summarization
useCases.description: Detect and block data poisoning attempts in ingestion pipelines.

useCases.title: Search augmentation
useCases.description: Ensure retrieval-augmented generation respects entitlements and privacy.

aiSecurity.ctaSubtitle: Our fusion teams deliver prioritized remediation plans in two weeks or less.

identityManagement.heroSubtitle: Unify governance, authentication, and privilege controls across cloud and legacy estates.
identityManagement.heroSupporting: We modernize IAM with adaptive policies that keep users productive while eliminating excess risk.
overviewParagraphs: We start by mapping your current governance model, then close visibility gaps with centralized policy management.
Our team orchestrates tooling from Okta, Ping, ForgeRock, and Microsoft to deliver a seamless, resilient IAM stack.

highlights.title: Target operating model
highlights.description: Documented roles, responsibilities, and processes that scale.

highlights.title: Least-privilege enforcement
highlights.description: Automated attestation campaigns and just-in-time access.

highlights.title: Platform engineering
highlights.description: Integration accelerators for HRIS, directories, and SaaS.

identityManagement.ctaSubtitle: Align identity strategy with business velocity and regulatory needs.

zeroTrust.heroSubtitle: Continuously verify users, devices, and applications before granting access to critical assets.
zeroTrust.heroSupporting: Our zero-trust architects design pragmatic roadmaps that deliver measurable risk reduction from day one.
overviewParagraphs: We align people, process, and technology to shrink the blast radius of any compromise.
Our methodology blends device trust, network segmentation, and adaptive authorization without slowing teams down.

highlights.title: Roadmaps rooted in reality
highlights.description: Prioritized workstreams mapped to existing investments.

cloudSecurity.heroSubtitle: Gain continuous visibility and control across multi-cloud environments without slowing delivery.
cloudSecurity.heroSupporting: We operationalize CSPM, CWPP, and CIEM so teams can build fast while staying compliant.
overviewParagraphs: Our teams integrate security earlier in the pipeline while giving platform owners self-service guardrails.
We translate complex compliance mandates into codified controls across AWS, Azure, and GCP.

networkSecurity.heroSupporting: We converge visibility, analytics, and enforcement so security teams can outpace adversaries.
overviewParagraphs: Gain end-to-end insight across campus, data center, and cloud networks while enforcing adaptive policies.
We integrate partner technologies like SentinelOne, Cisco, and Palo Alto to deliver cohesive defense.

Chat.title: Chat Support
Chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! üëã Welcome to The SamurAI. How can I help you today?

responses.greeting: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
responses.help: I'm here to help! You can ask me about our services, pricing, or any general questions. For specific inquiries, please use our contact form.
responses.services: We offer Cybersecurity Solutions, IT Consulting, Infrastructure Services, and more. Would you like to know more about a specific service?
responses.pricing: Our pricing varies based on your specific needs. Please contact our sales team for a customized quote. Would you like me to connect you?
responses.contact: You can reach us at info@thesamurai.com or call +1 (555) 123-4567. You can also fill out our contact form for detailed inquiries.
responses.thanks: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
responses.default: I understand. For more detailed assistance, please contact our support team or fill out the contact form. Is there anything else I can help with?
